title: iOS 13 Supprt
description: Support for Dark Mode in iOS 13 was added. If you have iOS 13.0+, you will definetly want this update!

title: Trip Stops
description: You are now able to select the places you are planning on stopping at, and select a time in which you plan on leaving.
Redesign of the trip time and distance label so it not only looks better, but also tells you more information.
I also fixed some design issues that caused the app to render awkwardly on the iPhone SE.

title: Starting Times and Night Time
description: You are now able to select your own starting time, allowing you to better plan ahead.
Night Time icons were added. If you traveling during the wee hours of the night, the new night time icons along with a darker colored cell will be shown.
